title: What the? "V" energy drink?
content:
[img]http://productsfromnz.com/pics/thb_1852.jpg[/img]

Did anyone else think "Vitalin" when you first saw this? I did. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

I mean, just look at it!____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: Re: What the? "V" energy drink?
content:
Wow! Can't be just a coincidence. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] I want some of that stuff right now.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: What the? "V" energy drink?
content:
I see these cans all day, I couldn't see any resemblance and I still can't.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Where
content: Where can I find one of these in America? Whats it called [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img]

title: Re: Where
content:
The name is actually "V". I dunno where you find them, I first saw the commercial a few days ago and I can't find it anywhere anyway.

The resemblance with Vitalin: it's green, it has a big "V" pasted on it, and it's an energy drink. Almost exactly what Vitalin is.____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: Re: Where
content: That's funny, they've been here in Australia for years but I never thought "Vitalin."  I think like most energy drinks they have a large amount of some ingredient (probably caffine), which means they're almost certainly banned from many countries.<font color="#EEF2EE">[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]</font>

title: Re: Where
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Where can I find one of these in America? Whats it called [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] [hr][/quote]

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vault_%28soft_drink%29]en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vau...t_drink%29[/url]
Not the same thing, but it's another green (the bottle, at least) drink with a V on the label. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img] -Genius314

title: Re: Where
content:
Nope, a resemblance to Vitalin never struck me. I first heard of it via an ad on Channel [V], a pay-TV music channel, and originally thought was some promotional thing they'd bought into. Now that I think about it (and research it), looks like the owners of the drink just managed to latch onto a sweet marketing deal.

It's a horrible drink, though. I'm not a fan of caffeinated beverages in general, as I don't find the drug necessary. I do consume Red Bull on the rare occasion I'm consuming Jagermeister, but I tried V with it once and it was repulsive.

title: Vault
content:
Vault is just repackaged Mountain Dew.

I've got to agree with Spleen, energy drinks are just plain disgusting. Jager is where it's at.

title: Re: Vault
content:
I have never tried any energy drinks. They'd cause me headache, as sugar, chocolate, milk and cola drinks do.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]

title: Re: Vault
content:
I never have (and probably never will) drink any energy drink. A regular caffeinated soda makes me hyper enough, so I'd hate to see how I'd react to that much. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Vault is just repackaged Mountain Dew.[hr][/quote]

I see that now, after seeing the red version of Vault (whatever it's called). Vault actually reminds me more of Bloog/Shikadi soda. -Genius314

title: Re: Vault
content:
Ah, well, if it's energy drink then I'm not interested in it either. I hate those, I know that without even trying them. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Vault
content:
I actually like the taste of V, and I'm sucking down so much coffee + working long hours lately so the caffeine boost is also appreciated.------------------

content:
Actually, it is more correct to say that Vault is repackaged Mellow Yellow.

Mellow Yellow was Coke's Mountain Dew clone which they have since phased out.
